name: Super Sumo Skater
description:
You are a sumo on a skate particpating in the sumo skating world championship. You must fight your way through the bracket and knock your oponents out of the ring 3 times to claim your title.  Gain bonuses by looking cool and scoring points. A local multiplayer mode is also available. SSS is a fighting game without attacks, so you must hit your oponents by rolling into them with your skateboard.

This game was made in 48 hours by William O'Sullivan-Dargis for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2018 Jam with the theme: "Genre without Mechanic"!

Third party resources:

Music from fakemusicgenerator.com

Sounds from SoundBible.com

How To Play:

- You must knock your oponent out of the ring.
- The first Sumo to win 3 rounds wins the game.
- Gain points by beeing cool.
- Points give you bonuses.
- (Tip) Your skate hits harder than your body.

- Left, Up and Right arrows to move or A, W, D in local multiplayer 
- Press escape to go back to the menu
